record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 11:30 A.M. TOMORROW
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 11:30 A.M. TOMORROW -- (Senate - December 18, 2007)

[Page: S15943]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business today, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:10 a.m., adjourned until Wednesday, December 19, 2007, at 11:30 a.m.
